SELECT rid, loan_contract_number FROM crrs_person_ent_guaranteed t WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM crrs_person_personal_loan WHERE loan_contract_number = t.loan_contract_number ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_person_personal WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')
表1《PART IV：持有企业债券明细》的[发债企业代码]应存在于表1《PART I：授信情况》[客户类型]为'单一法人客户'的[客户代码]中，或表1《PART II：集团客户授信拆分情况》的[成员单位的客户代码]中
表1《PART Ⅵ：表外业务明细》的[表外业务客户代码]应存在于表1《PART I：授信情况》[客户类型]为'单一法人客户'的[客户代码]中，或表1《PART II：集团客户授信拆分情况》的[成员单位的客户代码]中
同一[填报机构代码]下所有的[授信号码],除[授信号码]为'WNRSXYW'外,[授信号码]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.credit_code FROM crrs_ent_credit c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT credit_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE credit_code <> 'WNRSXYW' AND ( EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_trade_info WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')) GROUP BY credit_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.credit_code = t.credit_code
同一[填报机构代码]下[借据号]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.evidence_of_debt FROM crrs_ent_loan c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT evidence_of_debt, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_ent_loan p WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = p.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') GROUP BY evidence_of_debt ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.evidence_of_debt = t.evidence_of_debt
表1-PART VII-非现场监管统计机构编码
同一[填报机构代码]下[非现场监管统计机构编码]不能重复
同一[授信类型]下[工商注册编号]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.registration_number FROM crrs_group_group_client c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT credit_type, registration_number, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY credit_type, registration_number ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.credit_type = t.credit_type AND c.registration_number = t.registration_number AND c.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}'
同一[授信类型]，同一[客户代码/供应链编码]下[成员单位的客户代码]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.member_code FROM crrs_group_members c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.credit_type, m.customer_code, m.member_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_group_group_client g, crrs_group_members m WHERE m.customer_code = g.customer_code AND g.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY g.credit_type, m.customer_code, m.member_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.customer_code = t.customer_code AND c.member_code = t.member_code

SELECT rid, credit_code FROM crrs_ent_offbalance_sa t WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_credit WHERE credit_code = t.credit_code ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')
表1《PART I：授信情况》[客户类型]为'单一法人客户'的[客户代码]应存在于表3《PART I：单一法人基本情况》中的[客户代码];

SELECT rid, customer_code FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE t.customer_type = '2' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code ) AND (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_trade_info WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}'))
表2《PART I：集团基本情况》的[[集团成员数]与表2《PART III：成员名单》的成员单位的记录条数不相等
SELECT rid, member_number FROM crrs_group_group_client t WHERE member_number <> ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crrs_group_members WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code ) AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}'
表2《PART Ⅴ：关联集团信息》的[关联集团代码]应存在于表1《PART I：授信情况》的[客户类型]为'集团客户'的[客户代码]中

SELECT rid, group_code FROM crrs_group_ffiliated_groups t WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_credit WHERE customer_code = t.group_code AND customer_type = '1' ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')

SELECT c.rid, c.collateral_code FROM crrs_ent_guaranteed c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT customer_code, loancontract_number, guaranteed_contract_number, guaranteed_contract_type, collateral_type, collateral_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_ent_guaranteed t WHERE guaranteed_contract_type IN ('1', '2') AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') GROUP BY customer_code, loancontract_number, guaranteed_contract_number, guaranteed_contract_type, collateral_type, collateral_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.customer_code = t.customer_code AND c.loancontract_number = t.loancontract_number AND c.guaranteed_contract_number = t.guaranteed_contract_number AND c.guaranteed_contract_type = t.guaranteed_contract_type AND c.collateral_type = t.collateral_type AND c.collateral_code = t.collateral_code
对公客户担保情况统计
对于[担保合同类型]为“3-单人保证”，“4-多人保证”，“5-多人联保”或“6-多人分保”的，同一[客户代码]-[贷款或表外业务合同号]-[担保合同号]-[担保合同类型]-[押品权属人（或保证人）名称]-[押品权属人（或保证人）类型]-[押品权属人（或保证人）证件类型]下，[押品权属人（或保证人）证件代码]”不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.guarantor_paper_code FROM crrs_ent_guaranteed c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT customer_code, loancontract_number, guaranteed_contract_number, guaranteed_contract_type, guarantor_name, guarantor_type, guarantor_paper_type, guarantor_paper_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_ent_guaranteed t WHERE guaranteed_contract_type IN ('3', '4', '5', '6') AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') GROUP BY customer_code, loancontract_number, guaranteed_contract_number, guaranteed_contract_type, guarantor_name, guarantor_type, guarantor_paper_type, guarantor_paper_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.customer_code = t.customer_code AND c.loancontract_number = t.loancontract_number AND c.guaranteed_contract_number = t.guaranteed_contract_number AND c.guaranteed_contract_type = t.guaranteed_contract_type AND c.guarantor_name = t.guarantor_name AND c.guarantor_type = t.guarantor_type AND c.guarantor_paper_type = t.guarantor_paper_type AND c.guarantor_paper_code = t.guarantor_paper_code

SELECT c.rid, c.passport_number FROM crrs_passport c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.credit_type, e.customer_code, e.person_type, p.passport_number, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_group_group_client g, crrs_group_executives e, crrs_passport p WHERE e.customer_code = g.customer_code AND p.executives_id = e.executives_id AND g.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY g.credit_type, e.customer_code, e.person_type, p.passport_number ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.passport_number = t.passport_number UNION SELECT c.rid, c.passport_number FROM crrs_passport c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT e.customer_code, e.person_type, p.passport_number, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_single_executives e, crrs_passport p WHERE p.executives_id = e.executives_id AND EXISTS ( SELECT c.rid FROM crrs_single_corporation c WHERE c.customer_code = e.customer_code AND c.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' ) GROUP BY e.customer_code, e.person_type, p.passport_number ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.passport_number = t.passport_number

SELECT c.rid, c.customer_code FROM crrs_group_group_client c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT credit_type, customer_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY credit_type, customer_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.credit_type = t.credit_type AND c.customer_code = t.customer_code AND c.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}'
高管及重要关联人信息
同一[授信类型]，同一[客户代码/供应链编码]，同一[关系人类型]下[身份证号码]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.id_card_no FROM crrs_group_executives c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.credit_type, e.customer_code, e.person_type, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_group_group_client g, crrs_group_executives e WHERE e.customer_code = g.customer_code AND g.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY g.credit_type, e.customer_code, e.person_type ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.customer_code = t.customer_code AND c.person_type = t.person_type
同一[授信类型]-[客户代码/供应链编码]-[实际控制人名称]-[实际控制人证件类型]下，[实际控制人证件代码]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.paper_code FROM crrs_group_actualcontroller c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.credit_type, a.customer_code, a.controller_name, a.paper_type, a.paper_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_group_group_client g, crrs_group_actualcontroller a WHERE a.customer_code = g.customer_code AND g.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY g.credit_type, a.customer_code, a.controller_name, a.paper_type, a.paper_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.customer_code = t.customer_code AND c.controller_name = t.controller_name AND c.paper_type = t.paper_type AND c.paper_code = t.paper_code
现有业务余额占用授信额度
若[客户类型]为“1-集团客户”，则该集团PARTⅠ中同一[授信号码]下[现有业务余额占用授信额度]等于PARTⅡ中该[授信号码]对应的[现有业务余额占用授信额度]之和{0}
除在表1中[授信号码]为“WNRSXYW”的客户以外，若[客户类型]为“A1-大型企业”、“A2-中型企业”之一，并且对应表1中《PART III：贷款明细》的[贷款类型]为“1-贷款”、“3-贸易融资”、“5-法人账户透支”之一，则非空
除在表1中[授信号码]为“WNRSXYW”的客户以外，若[客户类型]为“A1-大型企业”、“A2-中型企业”之一，并且对应表1中《PART III：贷款明细》的[贷款类型]为“1-贷款”、“3-贸易融资”、“5-法人账户透支”之一，则非空
表3《PART I：单一法人基本情况》中的[客户代码]应存在于表1《PART I：授信情况》[客户类型]为'单一法人客户'的[客户代码]中，或表1《PART II：集团客户授信拆分情况》的[成员单位的客户代码]中
同一[借据号]-[共同债务人姓名]-[共同债务人证件类型]下，[共同债务人证件号码]不能重复
个人违约贷款担保情况统计
对于保证合同，即若[担保合同类型]为“3-单人保证”，“4-多人保证”，“5-多人联保”或“6-多人分保”的，同一[有效身份证件类型]-[证件号码]-[贷款合同号]-[担保合同号]-[担保合同类型]-[押品权属人（或保证人）名称]-[押品权属人（或保证人）类型]-[押品权属人（或保证人）证件类型]下，[押品权属人（或保证人）证件代码]”不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.guarantor_paper_code FROM crrs_person_ent_guaranteed c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.paper_type, p.paper_code, g.loan_contract_number, g.guaranteed_contract_number, g.guaranteed_contract_type, g.guarantor_name, g.guarantor_type, g.guarantor_paper_type, g.guarantor_paper_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_person_ent_guaranteed g, crrs_person_personal p WHERE g.guaranteed_contract_type IN ('3', '4', '5', '6') AND p.customer_code = g.customer_code AND p.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY p.paper_type, p.paper_code, g.loan_contract_number, g.guaranteed_contract_number, g.guaranteed_contract_type, g.guarantor_name, g.guarantor_type, g.guarantor_paper_type, g.guarantor_paper_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.loan_contract_number = t.loan_contract_number AND c.guaranteed_contract_number = t.guaranteed_contract_number AND c.guaranteed_contract_type = t.guaranteed_contract_type AND c.guarantor_name = t.guarantor_name AND c.guarantor_type = t.guarantor_type AND c.guarantor_paper_type = t.guarantor_paper_type AND c.guarantor_paper_code = t.guarantor_paper_code
同一[授信类型]，同一[客户代码/供应链编码]下[关联集团代码]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.group_code FROM crrs_group_ffiliated_groups c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT g.credit_type, a.customer_code, a.group_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_group_group_client g, crrs_group_ffiliated_groups a WHERE a.customer_code = g.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY g.credit_type, a.customer_code, a.group_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.customer_code = t.customer_code AND c.group_code = t.group_code
对于PARTⅠ中同一[客户代码]下，PART II 同一[关系人类型]下[护照号码]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.passport_number FROM crrs_passport c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT e.customer_code, e.person_type, p.passport_number, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_single_executives e, crrs_passport p WHERE p.executives_id = e.executives_id AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = e.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') GROUP BY e.customer_code, e.person_type, p.passport_number ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.passport_number = t.passport_number
个人违约贷款担保情况统计
对于抵质押合同，即若[担保合同类型]为“1-抵押”或“2-质押”的，同一[有效身份证件类型]-[证件号码]-[贷款合同号]-[担保合同号]-[担保合同类型]-[押品类型]下，[押品代码]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.collateral_code FROM crrs_person_ent_guaranteed c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.paper_type, p.paper_code, g.loan_contract_number, g.guaranteed_contract_number, g.guaranteed_contract_type, g.collateral_type, g.collateral_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_person_ent_guaranteed g, crrs_person_personal p WHERE g.guaranteed_contract_type IN ('1', '2') AND p.customer_code = g.customer_code AND p.data_dt = '${DATA_DT}' GROUP BY p.paper_type, p.paper_code, g.loan_contract_number, g.guaranteed_contract_number, g.guaranteed_contract_type, g.collateral_type, g.collateral_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.loan_contract_number = t.loan_contract_number AND c.guaranteed_contract_number = t.guaranteed_contract_number AND c.guaranteed_contract_type = t.guaranteed_contract_type AND c.collateral_type = t.collateral_type AND c.collateral_code = t.collateral_code
集团客户授信拆分情况
表1《PART II：集团客户授信拆分情况》的[成员单位的客户代码]应存在于表3《PART I：单一法人基本情况》的[客户代码]中

SELECT rid, customer_client_code FROM crrs_ent_group_client t WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_client_code ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')
重要股东及主要关联企业
股东/关联企业证件代码
表3《PART III：重要股东及主要关联企业》中,若[股东/关联企业类型]为'自然人'的[股东/关联企业证件代码]应存在于表3《PART II：法定代表人、高管及重要关联人信息》的[身份证号码]、[护照号码]、[其他证件号码]中
对公客户担保情况统计
表4《对公客户担保情况统计表》的[贷款或表外业务合同号]应存在于表1《PART III：贷款明细》的[贷款合同号]中或应存在于表1《PART Ⅵ：表外业务明细》的[合同号]中
表1《PART Ⅴ：持有企业股权明细》的[银行持股企业代码]应存在于表1《PART I：授信情况》[客户类型]为'单一法人客户'的[客户代码]中，或表1《PART II：集团客户授信拆分情况》的[成员单位的客户代码]中
表1《PART III：贷款明细》的[贷款客户代码]应存在于表1《PART I：授信情况》[客户类型]为'单一法人客户'的[客户代码]中，或表1《PART II：集团客户授信拆分情况》的[成员单位的客户代码]中
个人违约贷款担保情况统计
IF(NON_EMPTY(估值到期日期), FORMAT(估值到期日期, 1))
表外业务余额大于50亿元
EMPTY(业务余额) || 业务余额 <= 1000000.0
同一[贷款发放行代码]同一[借据号]下,且[币种代码]为'CNY',贷款余额跨期变化

SELECT rid, loan_balance FROM crrs_ent_loan t WHERE currency_code = 'CNY' AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_loan WHERE loanbank_code = t.loanbank_code AND evidence_of_debt = t.evidence_of_debt AND loan_balance <> t.loan_balance ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')
同一[贷款发放行代码]同一[借据号]下,贷款投向行业跨期变化

SELECT rid, vocation_code FROM crrs_ent_loan t WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_loan WHERE loanbank_code = t.loanbank_code AND evidence_of_debt = t.evidence_of_debt AND vocation_code <> t.vocation_code ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')
同一[承办银行机构代码]的同一[业务号码]下,表外业务类型跨期变化

SELECT rid, business_type FROM crrs_ent_offbalance_sa t WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_offbalance_sa WHERE bank_code = t.bank_code AND business_number = t.business_number AND business_type <> t.business_type ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')
表1-PARTⅠ中,同一[授信号码]下,[贷款余额]等于《PARTⅢ:贷款明细》中该[授信号码]下的[贷款余额]之和

SELECT rid,loan_balance FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE credit_type <> '4' AND NVL(loan_balance, 0) <> ( SELECT NVL(SUM(loan_balance), 0) FROM crrs_ent_loan WHERE credit_code = t.credit_code ) AND (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_trade_info WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}'))
表1 PARTⅠ中，同一[授信号码]下，[持有债券余额]等于《PARTⅣ：持有企业债券明细》中该[授信号码]下的债券[账面余额]之和

SELECT rid,bond_balance FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE credit_type <> '4' AND NVL(bond_balance, 0) <> ( SELECT NVL(SUM(book_balance), 0) FROM crrs_ent_bond WHERE credit_code = t.credit_code ) AND (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_trade_info WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}'))
若[客户类型]为[集团客户],则该集团PARTⅠ中同一[授信号码]下[持有股权余额]等于PARTⅡ中该[授信号码]对应的[持有股权余额]之和

SELECT rid,equitystake_balance FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE credit_type <> '4' AND customer_type = '1' AND NVL(equitystake_balance, 0) <> ( SELECT NVL(SUM(equitystake_balance), 0) FROM crrs_ent_group_client WHERE credit_code = t.credit_code ) AND (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_trade_info WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}'))
集团客户授信拆分情况
其他表内信用风险资产余额
若[客户类型]为[集团客户],则该集团PARTⅠ中同一[授信号码]下[其他表内信用风险资产余额]等于PARTⅡ中该[授信号码]对应的[其他表内信用风险资产余额]之和

SELECT rid,other_onbalance_sheet FROM crrs_ent_group_client c WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT rid FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE t.credit_code = c.credit_code AND customer_type = '1' AND NVL(other_onbalance_sheet, 0) <> ( SELECT NVL(SUM(other_onbalance_sheet), 0) FROM crrs_ent_group_client WHERE credit_code = t.credit_code ) ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = c.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')
集团客户授信拆分情况
若[客户类型]为[集团客户],则该集团PARTⅠ中同一[授信号码]下[表外业务余额]等于PARTⅡ中该[授信号码]对应的[表外业务余额]之和

SELECT rid,offbalance_sheet FROM crrs_ent_group_client c WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT rid FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE t.credit_code = c.credit_code AND customer_type = '1' AND NVL(offbalance_sheet, 0) <> ( SELECT NVL(SUM(offbalance_sheet), 0) FROM crrs_ent_group_client WHERE credit_code = t.credit_code ) ) AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = c.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}')
其中：贷款余额占用贷款授信额度
若[客户类型][集团客户],则该集团PARTⅠ中同一[授信号码]下[其中：贷款余额占用贷款授信额度]等于PARTⅡ中该[授信号码]对应的[其中：贷款余额占用贷款授信额度]之和

SELECT rid,balance_of_loan_limit FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE credit_type <> '4' AND credit_code <> 'WNRSXYW' AND customer_type = '1' AND NVL(balance_of_loan_limit, 0) <> ( SELECT NVL(SUM(balance_ofloan_limit), 0) FROM crrs_ent_group_client WHERE credit_code = t.credit_code ) AND (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_trade_info WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}'))
同一[客户代码]下，[授信号码]不能重复

SELECT c.rid, c.credit_code FROM crrs_ent_credit c, ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT customer_code, credit_code, COUNT(*) c FROM crrs_ent_credit t WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_single_corporation WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_group_group_client WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM crrs_ent_trade_info WHERE customer_code = t.customer_code AND data_dt = '${DATA_DT}') GROUP BY customer_code, credit_code ) WHERE c > 1 ) t WHERE c.customer_code = t.customer_code AND c.credit_code = t.credit_code
